title: Business Analyst
description:
About WebBuddy.


WebBuddy is a dynamic web design and development agency at the forefront of digital innovation.
We specialize in creating exceptional online experiences that drive business success for our diverse global clientele.
Our team combines creative excellence with technical expertise to deliver cutting-edge web solutions that make a real impact in the digital landscape.


Company Culture.


Innovative and forward-thinking environment.
Collaborative team of industry experts.
Remote-first workplace focusing on work-life balance.
Commitment to continuous learning and professional growth.
Results-driven approach to client success.


Position Overview


We are seeking a skilled Business Analyst to join our growing team in a full-time remote capacity.
The ideal candidate will bridge the gap between business objectives and technical solutions, playing a crucial role in our project delivery process.


Core Responsibilities.


Business Analysis & Strategy.
Conduct thorough analysis of business processes and systems.
Identify opportunities for process improvement and optimization.
Develop comprehensive business cases for proposed solutions.
Evaluate and document business requirements for new projects.
Requirements Management.
Gather and document detailed functional and non-functional requirements.
Create user stories, use cases, and process flow diagrams.
Validate requirements with stakeholders and technical teams.
Maintain requirements traceability throughout project lifecycle.
Process Optimization.
Map and analyze current business processes.
Identify inefficiencies and propose solutions.
Document and implement process improvements.
Monitor and measure the impact of implemented changes.
Stakeholder Management.
Facilitate meetings and workshops with stakeholders.
Present findings and recommendations to various audiences.
Manage stakeholder expectations and communication.
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients and team members.
Project Support.
Participate in sprint planning and agile ceremonies.
Support testing and quality assurance processes.
Contribute to project documentation and knowledge base.
Assist in training and change management initiatives.


Required Qualifications.


Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field.
3+ years of experience in business analysis or similar role.
Strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Proven experience in requirements gathering and documentation.
Understanding of software development lifecycle (SDLC).


Technical Skills


Proficiency in business analysis tools and methodologies.
Experience with requirements management tools.
Knowledge of process mapping tools (e.g, Visio, Lucidchart).
Understanding of database concepts and SQL basics.
Familiarity with agile project management tools.


Preferred Qualifications


Business Analysis certification (CBAP, CCBA, or equivalent).
Experience in web development projects.
Knowledge of UX/UI design principles.
Agile/Scrum certification.
Experience with data analytics and visualization tools.


Soft Skills


Communication.
Clear and concise written communication.
Effective verbal presentation skills.
Active listening abilities.
Strong facilitation capabilities.
Problem-Solving.
Analytical thinking.
Critical reasoning.
Creative solution development.
Decision-making abilities.
Leadership.
Project coordination.
Team collaboration.
Stakeholder management.
Initiative and self-motivation.
